title: Swaying or moving back and forth while reading the Quran - Assim al hakeem
transcript: if you go to a Masjid you would find people reciting in the Quran doing this or doing this while reciting the Quran what are you doing is that I'm reciting the Quran this is the way that the Jews pray you're not allowed to do this or Anne was revealed so that you would it would fill you up with tranquility calmness and submissiveness you read it without movement without such crazy movement
